title: Less Effective Flu Shots ‘Prove’ You Shouldn’t Get Them at All?
subtitle: Dubious websites are attempting to use a season in which the influenza vaccine is less effective than normal as evidence that getting inoculated is worthless.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The death from influenza of eight mostly vaccinated people over 65 in California's Santa Barbara County during the 2017-2018 flu season proves that you shouldn’t get the flu shot.
